categories.title: Functional Authentication & Security
description: If your question is about security, choose the category Functional Authentication & Security.
You could ask questions like:
- "What are the security protocols for user authentication?"
- "What multi-factor authentication methods are supported in the platform?"
- "Are biometric login options like fingerprint or face recognition supported?"

categories.title: Functional Dashboard
description: If your question is about Dashboard, choose the category 'Functional Retail Both Dashboard'.
You could ask questions like:
- "Can widgets on the dashboard be personalized for each user?"
- "Is there support for drag-and-drop customization of dashboard elements?"
- "Can admin users control or configure what appears on a user’s dashboard?"

categories.title: Functional Accounts
description: If your question is about Accounts, choose the category 'Functional Accounts'.
You could ask questions like:
- "How does the system categorize accounts (e.g., current, deposit, loan accounts)?"
- "Can users easily view and manage all account types in one interface?"
- "What information is provided about each account (e.g., balance, transaction history)?"

categories.title: Functional Transfers
description: If your question is about Transfers, choose the category 'Functional Transfers'.
You could ask questions like:
- "Are there alerts or notifications sent for completed transfers?"
- "Are approval workflows available for corporate transfers?"
- "What kind of validations are in place to prevent transfer errors?"

categories.title: Functional Service Requests
description: If your question is about Service Requests, choose the category 'Functional Service Requests'.
You could ask questions like:
- "Can users raise a service request directly from the app?"
- "Is there a service request history or log available for users?"
- "How is the administration of user messages handled?"

categories.title: Functional Cards
description: If your question is about Cards, choose the category 'Functional Cards'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Does the solution allow users to view the PIN code for their debit and credit cards?"
- "Can users change their debit or credit card PIN code in the solution?"
- "Does the solution support users requesting a new debit card in case it is lost?"

categories.title: Functional Bill Payments
description: If your question is about Bill Payments, choose the category 'Functional Bill Payments'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "User is able to use credit/debit card for Google Pay payments."
- "User is able to set debit/credit card in mobile app as a payment method."
- "Can users view payment history for past bill payments?"

categories.title: Functional Finance
description: If your question is about Finance, choose the category 'Functional Finance'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Is there a risk assessment questionnaire for financial profiling?"
- "Does the platform offer personalized financial planning tools?"
- "Are budgeting features like spending limits or alerts supported?"

categories.title: Functional Family Banking
description: If your question is about Family Banking, choose the category 'Functional Family Banking'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Is there an approval workflow for child-initiated transactions?"
- "Are sub-accounts available for children and teens with parental control?"
- "Are savings goals or reward programs available for children’s accounts?"

categories.title: Functional Loans
description: If your question is about Loans, choose the category 'Functional Loans'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Can users view and manage their active loans from the dashboard?"
- "Does the solution allow users to view details of their existing finances?"
- "Can customers calculate eligibility or estimate EMIs through the app?"

categories.title: Functional Settings
description: If your question is about Settings, choose the category 'Functional Settings'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Can users configure notification preferences for different services?"
- "Can users view and update their profile details like email, phone number, and address?"
- "Is there an option to enable or disable certain features/modules per user preference?"

categories.title: Functional Administration
description: If your question is about Administration, choose the category 'Functional Administration'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Can admins assign or revoke roles dynamically from the admin panel?"
- "Is there an option to block, activate, disable, or unlock a user and log a reason for the action?"
- "Is audit logging enabled for all administrative actions?"

categories.title: Functional Onboarding
description: If your question is about Onboarding, choose the category 'Functional Onboarding'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Are upgrades backwards compatible with the previous version?"
- "Does the solution follow mobile OS vendor guidelines and OWASP security best practices?"
- "Can onboarding flow be customized based on the user type (individual/business)?"

categories.title: Technical General
description: If your question is about General, choose the category 'Technical General'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "What are the general technical requirements for our system (RAM, OS, CPU, etc.)?"
- "How do I assess system performance?"
- "What technologies or frameworks are used in the backend and frontend?"

categories.title: Technical UI/UX
description: If your question is about UI/UX, choose the category 'Technical UI/UX'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Is there an option for a dark mode or theme customization?"
- "Creating a menu to add different or favorite links to be accessed easily"
- "Can users customize dashboard widgets and layouts?"

categories.title: Technical Architecture
description: If your question is about Architecture, choose the category 'Technical Architecture'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "How does the architecture accommodate scaling — both vertical and horizontal?"
- "Is there support for high availability and disaster recovery?"
- "Can you share a high-level view of the application architecture (e.g., microservices, monolith, etc.)?"

categories.title: Technical Integration
description: If your question is about Integration, choose the category 'Technical Integration'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Does the interface involve Event-based interaction?"
- "Does the system need to transform data structure?"
- "How is integration authentication managed (OAuth2, API keys, etc.)?"

categories.title: Technical Cloud Readiness
description: If your question is about Cloud, choose the category 'Technical Cloud Readiness'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Does the platform support deployment on public, private, and hybrid cloud environments?"
- "Does the solution support data encryption, communication encryption, and compliance with EU privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR)?"
- "Can the bank access data via APIs in the proposed solution?"

categories.title: Technical Performance
description: If your question is about Performance, choose the category 'Technical Performance'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Are benchmark reports available for the version proposed to the Bank?"
- "Have Non-Functional Tests (NFT) like load testing, stress testing, and endurance testing been performed in existing implementations?"
- "What's the availability scale of your solution?"

categories.title: Technical Security
description: If your question is about Security, choose the category 'Technical Security'.
For example, you could ask questions like:
- "Does the system support role-based access control (RBAC)?"
- "Is multi-factor authentication (MFA) implemented for both users and admins?"
- "Are regular security assessments and penetration tests conducted?"
